law.catch_line: Promotion of research and data collection on simplified procedures to determine their validity with respect to restoration of soil productivity on mined prime farmlands.
law.text: The cabinet shall encourage research and data collection to determine the validity of using a soil test or other simplified procedure to determine if mined prime farmland soils will meet yield requirements.
law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 284, sec. 2, effective July 14, 1992.
